title: Deployer duty: use provider information (Art. 13) to comply with DPIA obligations, where applicable

article_refs.quote: Where applicable, deployers of high-risk AI systems shall use the information provided under Article 13 ... to comply with their obligation to carry out a data protection impact assessment ...

legal_consequence.verbatim: Where applicable, deployers of high-risk AI systems shall use the information provided under Article 13 of this Regulation to comply with their obligation to carry out a data protection impact assessment under Article 35 of Regulation (EU) 2016/679 or Article 27 of Directive (EU) 2016/680.

items.label: Interplay with data protection law
items.text: This obligation concerns how deployers meet DPIA obligations under GDPR/Law Enforcement Directive using provider information from Article 13.

items.label: Penalty (Art. 99)
items.text: Obligation/requirement; fines up to EUR 15,000,000 or 3% turnover may apply.
